name: Parsleyed Potatoes
keywords: gluten-free, new potatoes, parsley, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: For an attractive touch, use a paring knife to remove a thin band of skin around the middle of each potato. Leave the rest of the skin intact.
Wash the potatoes and place them in a saucepan with water to cover. Add the salt, bring to a boil and simmer for about 15 minutes or until cooked.
Drain the potatoes, add the pepper, butter and parlsey. Toss well and serve hot.
